The claim is based on a study conducted: the chief investment officer for J.P. Morgan Private Bank.
The study analyzed the prior private: sector experience of all 432 Cabinet members in the history of the presidential Cabinet.
The study focused on Cabinet positions s: Commerce, Treasury, Agriculture, Interior, Labor, Transportation, Energy, and Housing & Urban Development.
The study considered various industries: including agribusiness, chemicals, finance, construction, communications, energy, insurance, mining, publishing, pharmaceuticals, railroads, and steel.
